verbs.description: During his trip to Key West , Florida , Donald Trump [V: was] greeted by a loud group of protestors who were very clear about their disapproval of the president , his visit , and his policies .

[ARGM-TMP: During his trip to Key West , Florida] , [ARG1: Donald Trump] was [V: greeted] [ARG0: by a loud group of protestors who were very clear about their disapproval of the president , his visit , and his policies] .

During his trip to Key West , Florida , Donald Trump was greeted by [ARG1: a loud group of protestors] [R-ARG1: who] [V: were] [ARG2: very clear about their disapproval of the president , his visit , and his policies] .
